body_html:
Look for something like this
REGISTER_KERNEL_BUILDER(Name("Conv2D")
.Device(DEVICE_CPU)
.TypeConstraint("T"),
Conv2DOp<CPUDevice, float>);

hence, search for "Conv2DOp" to see the implementation

body:
Look for something like this
REGISTER_KERNEL_BUILDER(Name("Conv2D")
                            .Device(DEVICE_CPU)
                            .TypeConstraint<float>("T"),
                        Conv2DOp<CPUDevice, float>);

hence, search for "Conv2DOp" to see the implementation
